name: Jennifer v1
ref_text: The Gratitude Glasses. Change your view, change your life. Settle in. Take a deep breath. Turn off notifications on your phone if you can. Ask God to give you a new perspective and to help you see your life through a lens of gratitude rather than one of complaining.  Thought starter Gratitude is a spiritual habit that helps us focus on God’s goodness, even when life feels messy or hard.  Think of gratitude like a camera filter: it doesn’t change the scene, but it changes how we see it. When we apply it, even the ordinary becomes special.    Here’s what we’ll learn in this Quick Quiet Time:

name: Jennifer v2
